sentences.sContent: We lay huddled together for warmth.
sentences.sCn: 我们紧紧挤在一起取暖。

trans.tranCn: 聚集在一起， 挤作一团
trans.tranOther: if a group of people huddle together, they stay very close to each other, especially because they are cold or frightened

trans.tranCn: 挤在一起的人， 一堆杂乱的东西
trans.tranOther: a group of people or things that are close together, but not arranged in any particular order, pattern, or system
